name: Sword of Courage
description: A legendary sword that radiates bravery and valor.
looks: The Sword of Courage is a long, shining blade with intricate engravings of heroic scenes along the hilt.

special_weapon_skils.Sword Mastery: Increases damage dealt with swords by 10%.

special_effects.Courageous Strike: Has a chance to stun the target for 4 seconds on a successful hit.

name: Longsword of the Dragon
description: A mighty longsword forged from the scales of a dragon. It exudes a fiery aura and is said to channel the power of the ancient beasts.
looks: The longsword has a gleaming silver blade with intricate engravings of dragons along its length. The hilt is made of blackened steel with a dragon-shaped pommel.

special_weapon_skills.two_handed_swords: Grants proficiency in wielding two-handed swords.

special_effects.dragon_blood: Increases resistance to fire damage by 20%.

name: Sword of the Dragon
description: A legendary sword with the power of the dragon.
looks: The sword has a curved blade with intricate dragon engravings. The hilt is made of polished silver with a dragon head pommel.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic iron sword that is commonly used by adventurers.
looks: The iron sword has a slightly curved blade with a hilt wrapped in leather for better grip. The blade is dull, showing signs of wear and tear.

name: Sword of the Dragon
description: A powerful sword forged from the scales of a dragon.
looks: The sword has a gleaming silver blade with intricate dragon scale patterns. The hilt is made of black leather and adorned with a dragon head pommel.

name: Sword of the Dragon
description: A mighty sword forged from dragon scales, capable of dealing devastating blows.
looks: The Sword of the Dragon has a gleaming silver blade with intricate dragon-scale patterns etched into it. The hilt is made of polished ebony, adorned with a dragon head-shaped pommel.

special_effects.fire_breath: 25% chance to unleash a fiery breath attack on hit, dealing additional fire damage.

name: Iron Sword
looks: A medium-sized sword with a black iron blade and a simple hilt

name: Sword of the Lion
description: A mighty sword imbued with the strength and ferocity of a lion.
looks: The Sword of the Lion has a golden hilt with intricate lion engravings. The blade is made of silver steel and gleams in the light.

special_weapon_skills.swordmanship: Increases sword attacks accuracy and damage

special_effects.ferocious_strike: Has a chance to deal double damage on a successful hit

name: Health Potion
looks: A small glass vial filled with a red liquid

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a straight blade with a crossguard and a hilt wrapped in leather.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a robust iron blade with a leather-wrapped handle.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sturdy sword made of steel.
looks: The blade of the sword is polished and sharp, with a hilt wrapped in leather for a better grip.

name: Sword of Flames
description: A powerful sword imbued with the element of fire.
looks: The blade of the sword is made of enchanted obsidian, glowing with intense heat. The hilt is adorned with intricate carvings of flames.

special_effects.unleash_flames: Has a chance to unleash a wave of flames, dealing additional fire damage to all nearby enemies.

name: Iron Sword
looks: The sword has a simple design with a straight blade and a hilt made of leather.

name: Iron Sword
description: A simple and sturdy iron sword.
looks: The sword is about three feet long with a straight blade and a simple hilt. The blade has a dull grey color.
